content: Can you tell me a joke about glue?

Sure! Here's one: Why don't scientists trust atoms when they go to the bathroom? Because they make up everything! Okay, maybe that's not exactly a joke about glue, but how about this one: Why did the glue go to school? Because it wanted to stick with its education! Haha, I know, it's a bit of a stretch, but I hope it makes you smile!
